Commands.Protean Swords: 3-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + ST HP attack  BRV hits are dispersed when there are multiple enemies  Grants 1 stack of 「Maleficium」 for 3 turns (5 stacks max)   While 「Maleficium V」 is active:  - Turns to 「Protean Swords+」  　∟ 9-HIT AoE magic BRV attack + ST HP attack   「Maleficium」 raises Max BRV and Attack
Commands.Hell's Judgment: Reduces target's BRV to 7/10 before the BRV hits  2-HIT magic BRV+HP attack  Inflicts 「Sorceress' Hatred」 for 3 turns  Grants 1 stack of 「Maleficium」 for 3 turns (5 stacks max)   While 「Maleficium V」 is active:  - Turns to 「Hell's Judgment+」  　∟ 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  　∟ HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies   「Sorceress' Hatred」 lowers Defense and deals BRV damage
Commands.Set BRV Regen: Grants 「BRV Regen」 for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Apocalypse: Raises BRV based on Initial BRV before BRV hits  Follows up with a 2-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attack  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies  No Action Delay  Does not increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count  Grants 「Griever's Magic」 for 6 turns  Grants special effect 「Junction Griever」 for 2 turns   「Griever's Magic」 raises Max BRV and Attack   While 「Junction Griever」 is active:  - No Action Delay for all abilities  - Does not increase turn count  - Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Protean Swords Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Protean Swords ,  Protean Swords+
Passives.Hell's Judgment Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Hell's Judgment ,  Hell's Judgment+
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Burgeoning Hatred: After using  BRV Attack  or any ability (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack):- Marginally raises Attack up to 10 times.
Passives.Sorceress of a Distant Future: Slightly raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while  Maleficium  is active
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed: Moderately raises Attack and Speed while buffed
Passives.Protean Swords Extend: When using  Protean Swords ,  Protean Swords+ :- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120%While  Maleficium  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  Maelstrom    Becomes AoE   Reduces all enemies' BRV to 4/5 before the BRV hits   Increases the number of BRV hits to 4   Slightly raises total BRV potency   Increases  Maleficium  stacks by 1
Passives.Buff Base&Boost: Moderately raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Hell's Judgment Extend: When using  Hell's Judgment ,  Hell's Judgment+ :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 4- Tremendously raises total BRV potencyWhen using  Hell's Judgment+ :- Deals 100% HP damage to all targets
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Power: Raises Initial BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Set BRV Regen Extend: When using  Set BRV Regen , adds the following effect:- Moderately raises Initial BRV

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set BRV Regen  use +1Duration of  Set BRV Regen  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Looking Glass CP: 15: When using  Protean Swords ,  Protean Swords+ :- Raises BRV potency- Extends the duration of  Maleficium - Grants 1 additional stack of  Maleficium When using  Maelstrom :- Increases the BRV reduction percentage- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Grants 1 additional stack of  Maleficium
Weapons.Grandeur CP: 35: When using  Hell's Judgment ,  Hell's Judgment+ :- Raises BRV potency- Increases the BRV reduction percentage- Extends the duration of  Maleficium - Grants 1 additional stack of  Maleficium - Extends the duration of  Sorceress' Hatred When using  Hell's Judgment+ :- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
Weapons.Nightmare CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Apocalypse
